title: Garen's Silence is Bugged (Riot needs to see this)
body: Everytime I use silence on people with garen, they are still able to cast abilities within the first milisecond of being silenced. It's annoying now, because with other champs like Soraka and Cho'gath, once you get silenced, I can't do anything....So I'm just pointing this out, his silence needs to be fixed.
